'''''Misfortune Strikes in Threes Alone...''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] ''[[The Marvelous Misadventures of Conulaf]]''.
